column4: I couldn't get mythtv to install properly yesterday...it was driving me crazy
yeah, I was often doing that yesterday :D
I've known a couple of people had that problem.
that's fixed it every time I've seen the problem
mthtv user kept using a password that I didnt know, so I could run as mythtv user, when I changed mythtv user password to something then installation went wacky
okay, try setting the mythtv user password in mysql, then removing all configuration in ~mythtv ?
I'll give it a go another time...mainly because mythtv and skype don't like each other and I have skype installed atm
the libqt3c-mt.deb conflicts with skypes libqt3cxxxx.deb
